item.title: Security Course Catalog
item.description: This is a compilation of online courses that I have used to skill myself up. A Cloud Guru To get some familiarity with cloud and devops practices, I took a number of courses here to prepare for some AWS exams and general professional development. Courses Taken: AWS Certified Cloud Practicioner AWS Certified SysOps Deploying to AWS with Terraform and Ansible DevOps Essentials DevSecOps Essentials Ansible Quick Start Jenkins Quick Start Cantrill.
